name: Ghost Hack
description:
Play as Rokoto, a Robot Mercenary and take out endless waves of Robot Enemies.

  1.  Killing a Robot lets you collect their soul.
  2. Dying gives you special Abilities to use the souls for.
  3. With at least 3 souls collected, you can respawn anywhere in the room.
  4. With at least 5 souls collected, you can Hack another Robot and take control.
  5. Die without enough souls collected and the game will Restart!

See how far you can get in this robot soul stealing endless horde game!

Gamepad:

  • Start is to Start.
  • Right Trigger is to Shoot.
  • Right Stick is to Aim. Left Stick is to Move.
  • A is to Jump.
  • B is to Self Destruct.
  • In Ghost Form: B is to Respawn, X is to Posses and Enemy that you're Touching

Keyboard and Mouse:

  • Enter is to Start.
  • Left Mouse Button is to Shoot.
  • The Mouse is used to Aim. Left Stick is to Move.
  • W is to Jump.
  • B is to Self Destruct.
  • In Ghost Form: E is to Respawn, Q is to Posses and Enemy that you're Touching.

For Both:

  • Backspace is to Restart the Game.
  • Escape is to Exit the Game.
  • Shift is to switch Full Screen on and off.

Tips!

Becareful! After pressing start the enemies will appear quickly. There is no need to worry about ammo. Don't be afraid of the white balls. And After you die, and you don't have enough souls to respawn, it will take a little bit of time for the game to restart. If you possessed an enemy, you'll have to self destruct before you can start the next wave of enemies. Thank you and  Have Fun!

And please, leave me a message on what you think!
